item.title: Forum on Equality and the Digital Divide
item.description: The Forum on Equality and the Digital Divide was held on June 9 and 10.

item.title: ICT Companies Social Network Analysis
item.description: Natural Language Processing or NLP is the field of study on computational analysis of human language.

item.title: Internet Fix Access Dashboard for Argentina
item.description: It is possible to make a dashboard with basic data on fix access in Argentina very quickly (about 30 minutes), with open data from ENACOM, open source tools (in this case R, Plotly and Flexdashboards but there are many others) and deploy it online for free with Github Pages.

item.title: Using Satellite Images
item.description: Brief concept intro1 Satellite remote sensing or satellite remote sensing is the activity of collecting data through the use of sensors, in this case satellites, from a place to which there is no physical access, that is, remotely.

item.title: ICT Prices Evolution
item.description: Let’s see what was the evolution of prices of ICT services in Argentina in recent years.

item.title: Internet Submarine Cables
item.description: Some time ago Tyler Morgan-Wall made a visualization of all the submarine internet cables with Telegeography data.

item.title: 30 Day Map Challenge Day 3 and 4
item.description: Note: for thoses interested in the code for each visualization you can see it by pressing the “Show All Code” button at the top right of the page or by pressing the “Code” button above and to the right of each visualization.

item.title: 30 Days Map Challenge Day 1 and 2
item.description: Note: for those interested in the code for each visualization you can see it by pressing the “Show All Code” button at the top right of the page or by pressing the “Code” button above and to the right of each visualization.

item.title: About
item.description: I have a degree in Political Science (Universidad Católica Argentina - UCA), a Masters degree in Public Policy (George Washington University - GWU) and a Specialization in Data Science (Instituto Tecnológico de Buenos Aires - ITBA).
